message:
SYSTEM: Fpriyatna-oeg-20141002.pdf: Página 36
Summary
●R2RML <-> DM
o DM -> R2RML (obvious)
o R2RML -> DM ( ? )
▪
R2RMLLite
●We say they are “equivalent”, if
o Information preservation property holds
o Query result preservation property holds
●The consequence
o R2RML engine (morph-RDB, D2RQ, ontop, etc) is 
not the only option for evaluating R2RMLLite 
mappings
speaker: SYSTEM
